assessment_item.title: CMWVZ6Q1 Movement of the molecules of solids, gases or liquids from the region of their higher concentration to the region of their lower concentration is known as _________ .
assessment_item.body:

Movement of the molecules of solids, gases or liquids from the region of their higher concentration to the region of their lower concentration is known as _________ .

active transport
